Forinov est le réseau social de l'open i: Forinov is the social network for open innovation that connects startups, companies and partners to facilitate their collaboration. Forinov optimizes monitoring, sourcing and portfolio management of startups and partners.

Notre histoire et nos missions chez Fori: Our history and our missions at Forinov
Mettre en relation des startups, entrepr: Connect startups, companies and innovation partners and provide them with a simple and complete solution to innovate together! That's all!
about_paragraphs: Forinov is the story of two brother and sister, passionate about innovation and convinced that the company of tomorrow must collaborate with startups.

After 5 years of experience in business transformation consulting and then in innovation departments, our CEO Marie Josephine Brognon, notices that startups lose a lot of energy trying to contact the right person and get an appointment. Too many (re-re-re) reminders for too few concrete projects.
On the business side, it's an endless watch, an infinity of interlocutors and incomplete and obsolete start-up files. In short, there was no common solution to meet their needs.

It was in 2018 that she decided, with her brother Thomas Brognon, CTO with 17 years of experience, to develop a complete and collaborative innovation solution. Their ambition: to connect all of these players and bring together the best of open innovation solutions, in one platform!
In 2019, a first version co-constructed hand in hand with each type of actor was born.
Today, Forinov brings together thousands of users who exchange, realize opportunities and demonstrate that the Startups x Corporates collaboration is not just a myth, but a necessity.
Toi aussi tu es passionné·e d’innovation: Are you passionate about innovation too?
Les meilleures startups sont sur Forinov: The best startups are on Forinov, register for free
Vous proposez une solution innovante ? V: Vous proposez une solution innovante ? Vous cherchez des clients B2B ? Rejoignez Forinov pour booster votre visibilité et entrer en relation simplement avec des entreprises qui ont besoin de vos solutions pour innover !
Forinov, la solution la plus complète d’: Forinov, the most complete open innovation solution
Référencer et promouvoir mes solutions g: Reference and promote my solutions through a clear and complete profile. Be identified and contacted by companies looking for innovative startups. Share my news with a community of innovative actors.
Identifier et contacter directement les: Identify and directly contact key company employees (innovation departments, business managers ...). Simplify my exchanges thanks to a collaborative platform. Centralize the follow-up of my relationships.
Je crée mon profil « startup » gratuitem: I create my free « startup » profile in a few clicks.
J’accède à la communauté et aux annuaire: I access the community and the directories of opportunities, companies and partners.
Je mets en avant mes solutions et partag: I highlight my solutions and share my news to improve my ranking.
Forinov, est-ce vraiment gratuit pour le: Is Forinov really free for startups?
Oui ! Car nous cherchons à créer la prem: Yes! Because we want to create the first community of innovation actors. Impossible without startups: so register the different members of your team to not miss any opportunity! Soon, premium options will be available for even more visibility with companies and new exclusive features!
Quel est l’intérêt de passer par Forinov: What is the interest in going through Forinov rather than another channel?
Comment me faire repérer par les entrepr: How can I be noticed by companies?
Pour mettre en avant ton profil, mets le: To highlight your profile, update it regularly, publish news, add your target companies to your wishlist and follow their profiles ... they will be informed! Also think to specify your different products and services: your profile will be more attractive and our matching algorithm will do the rest!
Comment puis-je postuler à un appel à pr: How can I apply for a call for projects?
Retrouve toutes les opportunités en cour: Find all the opportunities in progress in the «Opportunities» tab. With your Forinov profile, you will be directly informed of calls for projects that match your profile. To apply, answer the questionnaire associated with the call, and save time thanks to the many information pre-filled from your profile!
Qui sont les personnes que je peux conta: Who are the people I can contact on Forinov?
Sur Forinov, tu peux retrouver des colla: On Forinov, you can find employees of large groups, SMEs but also key contacts of incubators, accelerators or investment structures. On the company side, there are not only innovation managers registered but also business managers (HR, finance, digital, purchasing ...) : your potential customers are so many!
Mon profil est-il celui d’une startup ou: Is my profile that of a startup or a company?
Sur Forinov, nous connectons des startup: On Forinov, we connect startups, companies and partners such as incubators, accelerators. We understand the word «startups» in the broad sense of the term! Any young company with an innovative solution is welcome to respond to the needs of large groups and SMEs looking for solutions like yours!
Comment faire décoller mon business ?: How to take off my business?
Postuler aux appels à candidatures d’ent: Apply to calls for applications from companies and partners and be alerted to new opportunities. Discover directly the needs of companies. Centralize and simplify the follow-up of my applications.
Trouvez et entrez en relation avec les s: Find and get in touch with startups that meet your needs. Watch, sourcing, calls for projects and portfolio management ... So many solutions that await you on Forinov!
Je découvre les offres Pro / Entreprise: I discover the Pro / Enterprise offers
Bien plus qu’une communauté... La platef: Much more than a community ... The new generation open innovation platform, connected to the ecosystem!
Être membre d’un réseau d’acteurs innova: Be a member of a network of innovative actors
Identifier et contacter des startups et: Identify and contact innovative startups and partners. Follow qualified and updated profiles, all fields combined. Connect and communicate with innovative ecosystems.
Recevoir des recommandations en fonction: Receive recommendations based on my search criteria. Communicate and manage opportunities: calls for projects, competitions ... Centralize and simplify the follow-up of application files.
Gérer et faire grandir mon portefeuille: Manage and grow my portfolio of startups and partners. Simplify exchanges with my network and engage my employees. Centralize and manage my activity.
Car on est tous concerné par l’innovatio: Because we are all concerned about innovation!
Vous cherchez des solutions aux besoins: You are looking for solutions to business needs. You provoke and diffuse innovation to prepare tomorrow.
Vous insufflez l’agilité, encouragez le: You inspire agility, encourage change and digital acculturation. You carry and bring change.
Vous concevez et mettez en œuvre les str: You design and implement marketing and communication strategies and are always looking to reinvent yourself.
Vous attirez et retenez les talents, vou: You attract and retain talents, you manage the employer brand and look for innovative solutions to offer them.
Vous cherchez à trouver des prestataires: You are looking for more and more innovative suppliers and suppliers. You are the head of tomorrow's solutions.
La plateforme la plus complète d'open in: The most complete open innovation platform
startups et des centaines de partenaire: startups and hundreds of partners who are waiting for you
Choisissez l’offre la plus adaptée pour: Choose the most suitable offer for you and your company
Nous partageons le même constat que les: We share the same observation as the Forinov team: it is urgent to facilitate relations between large companies and startups. That is why we decided to trust them and accompany them from the release of their platform. Today Forinov allows us to centralize the flow of requests from startups, discover new solutions and follow, collaboratively, our different portfolios of startups, which is essential for a mutualist group like ours!
Rejoindre Forinov va contribuer au dével: Joining Forinov will contribute to the development of our entrepreneurs. It is a precious asset for our incubated! In addition to optimizing the follow-up of our support with all our members, Forinov allows us to bring more visibility within the entrepreneurial ecosystem and privileged access to opportunities (calls for projects ...).
Pourquoi publier un appel à projet sur F: Why publish a call for projects on Forinov?
Forinov vous permet de diffuser vos beso: Forinov allows you to disseminate your needs and opportunities (calls for projects, competitions ...) in a few clicks. You can create your custom forms and centralize the management of applications (ratings, comments). Startups save precious time by following the status of their application (and therefore solicit you less). The + for you: we help you in the sourcing of startups, by inviting startups who would not yet be on Forinov.
Non, vous disposez d’espaces totalement: No, you have completely private spaces reserved for you and your colleagues to share, for example, your meeting minutes, your opinions and comments ... Only authorized users on your account have access to this confidential information.
Quels sont les avantages de Forinov pour: What are the advantages of Forinov for my team?
Fini les reportings fastidieux et obsolè: No more tedious and outdated reports after a month! The strengths of Forinov: the centralization of searches, the possibility of sharing some of your portfolio with your colleagues and above all the updating of the sheets by the startups themselves! Your colleague met a startup a few months ago and did not follow up? Discover why without having to go back to your emails!
D’où viennent les données et comment son: Where do the data come from and how are they updated?
Les utilisateurs mettent à jour leur pro: Users update their own profile which allows you to have the information directly from the source and to be informed of the latest news. For startups it is an opportunity to be visible not only from a company but from the whole ecosystem. For you, it is a precious time saving: no need to create and update sheets, you just have to follow them to add them to your portfolio. You can then manage the follow-up of your relationships (meetings, notes ...)
J’ai déjà un CRM de startups, qu’est-ce: I already have a CRM of startups, what does Forinov bring me more?
Les équipes de Forinov s’occupent d’invi: The Forinov team takes care of inviting the startups of your CRM for free. The advantage? You will no longer have to update the data every month because the startup takes care of everything! Forinov therefore gives you access to real-time data and automated reporting!
Avec votre profil personnalisé et comple: With your personalized and complete profile, you indicate precisely what you are looking for on Forinov, but also what you are not looking for. You can also follow startup profiles: they are informed and therefore do not try to share and sell you their products, because you have access to them in a few clicks. Calls for projects are the signal for them that you are looking for a specific technology!
Rejoignez la plus grande communauté d’ac: Join the largest community of innovative actors and double the strength of your network
Incubateurs, accélérateurs, Business Ang: Incubators, accelerators, Business Angels ... This community is for you! At stake: visibility of your offers and your startups, management of your calls for applications, monitoring of your portfolio and your network!
De nombreux partenaires ont déjà rejoint: Many partners have already joined the community to bring more value to their startups and network. Why not you?
Faites vivre votre réseau en quelques cl: Bring your network to life in a few clicks
Promouvoir, suivre l’actualité de vos st: Promote, follow the news of your startups or discover new ones. Give visibility to your offers and animate your community. Identify the needs of companies and put them in touch with your startups.
Diffuser et gérer vos opportunités : app: Distribute and manage your opportunities: calls for applications, challenges ... Receive recommendations based on your preferences. Simplify the management of your requests and their follow-up.
Suivre, gérer et faire grandir mon porte: Follow, manage and grow my portfolio of startups and partners. Simplify exchanges with my network and share opportunities with it. Manage my activity and optimize my time.
Car chacun d’entre vous soutient l’innov: Because each of you supports innovation!
Vous aidez les pépites à décoller et che: You help the gems to take off and are looking for more opportunities for them!
Vous soutenez les jeunes pousses dans le: You support the young shoots in their first collaborations and are looking for more visibility for them!
Vous financez les pépites de demain, sou: You finance the gems of tomorrow, want to help them develop their business and are looking for ways to follow their evolution!
Que vous représentiez une technopole ou: Whether you represent a technopole or a network of innovative actors, you are looking for more visibility and opportunities for them.
Vous souhaitez connecter vos porteurs de: You want to connect your project holders to their future customers to help them grow!
Quelle valeur ajoutée pour mes startups: What added value for my startups?
Sur Forinov, votre réseau de startups et: On Forinov, your network of startups and alumni gains visibility, has access to privileged connections with key collaborators of large groups, SMEs and investors, and above all builds a unique profile visible to all! So goodbye to the thousand and one sheets to constantly update: Forinov centralizes all this information and even uses it to make the applications of your startups faster!
Comment puis-je inviter mes startups à s: How can I invite my startups to register on Forinov?
Un lien simple vous permettra d’inviter: A simple link will allow you to invite your startups. Our teams are also available to make these invitations in order to centralize, on a single platform, all your startups and alumni. No more
Puis-je faire des recommandations entre: Can I make recommendations between my startups and companies?
Forinov est aussi fait pour ça ! Si cert: Forinov is also made for that! If some profiles of your network seem to match the searches of the companies registered, do not hesitate to push their profiles! The internal messaging and the detailed profiles of the collaborators will allow you to simplify your procedures and put your startups in touch with the right people!
Comment puis-je mettre en avant mes star: How can I highlight my startups on Forinov?
Rien de plus simple, il vous suffit de c: Nothing could be simpler, all you have to do is create public folders and add your startups and / or alumni. These folders will be directly accessible from your profile. This represents a real showcase for your startups. You can also create private folders that you share only with your partners in order to help them identify startups that match the needs they express. The real plus? No need to ask your startups for their new logo or their latest pitch, everything is automatically updated from their profiles!
Vous pouvez nous contacter par mail à l': You can contact us by email at the address
Nos équipes vous répondront dans les mei: Our teams will answer you as soon as possible!
